node.title: Cover Corp. CEO Yagoo Makes Guest Appearance at CRX 2022
node.description: Cover Corp. CEO Motoaki Tanigo, known as “YAGOO” to his many fans and followers, made a surprise appearance at Crunchyroll Expo 2022.

node.title: Cosplay Mania 2022 to Host Moona Hoshinova and Pavolia Reine
node.description: Cosplay Mania 2022 has announced that it is also set to host Moona Hoshinova and Pavolia Reine. The two VTubers will participate in the event's Japanese Anime Music (JAM) Concert.

node.title: Cosplay Mania 2022 to Host Ayunda Risu and Kureiji Ollie
node.description: Cosplay Mania 2022, an annual cosplay convention in the Philippines, is set to host Hololive Indonesia's Ayunda Risu and Kureiji Ollie this October.

node.title: Interview: Hanari, Hong Kong Cosplayer Recognized by Haachama
node.description: In this feature story, we put the spotlight on Hanari and asked her how she got into the VTuber rabbit hole, and what she felt after being recognized by one.

node.title: Hololive’s Murasaki Shion Releases New Single Chandelier
node.description: Murasaki Shion from Hololive has released a new single titled 'Chandelier'. The track is produced and written by popular Vocaloid producer Kanaria.

node.title: Mori Calliope Releases Music Video for Let’s End The World
node.description: Popular Hololive English VTuber Mori Calliope has released a music video for her track “Let’s End The World”. The song is produced by Vocaloid producer Giga-P and popular Japanese music producer TeddyLoid.

node.title: YAGOO Shows Off Summer Dance Moves in Hololive Ondo Music Video
node.description: Motoaki Tanigo ‘YAGOO’ has shown off his summer dance moves in the music video for “Hololive Ondo” the second track for the Hololive Summer 2022 event.

node.title: Inugami Korone Teams Up with Sonic for Japanese Exclusive Sonic Frontiers Bonuses
node.description: Sega of Japan announced an exciting collaboration with Hololive’s very own Inugami Korone to provide incredible bonuses for fans of both the super-fast hedgehog and gamer dog for Sonic Frontiers, which is due to release on November 8th.

node.title: Hololive Meet at Crunchyroll Expo 2022 Schedule
node.description: Hololive Meet is coming to this weekend's Crunchyroll Expo 2022! Hololive Production's international project brings 28 of its personalities to the annual event to be held at the San Jose McEnery Convention Center in California on the weekend of August 5 to 7.

node.title: Tokino Sora Reaches 1 Million YouTube Subscribers
node.description: Hololive's 0-generation VTuber Tokino Sora finally reached the 1 million YouTube subscriber milestone, making her the 30th Hololive member in general to receive such a milestone.
